name: SEER Mets PharynxOther
title: SEER Mets
notes: **Note:**  Supraclavicular and transverse cervical lymph nodes are now coded in SEER Regional Nodes because they are categorized as N rather than M in TNM.
rows:

Distant lymph node(s):
    Mediastinal
    Supraclavicular (transverse cervical)
    Other distant lymph node(s)

Further contiguous extension

Metastasis

Level VB - Transverse cervical, supraclavicular (see Note)
Level VII - Superior mediastinal group 
    Esophageal groove
    Paratracheal - below suprasternal notch
    Pretracheal - below suprasternal notch
Other groups:
    Facial:
        Buccinator (buccal)
        Mandibular
        Nasolabial
    Parotid:
         Infraauricular
         Intraparotid
         Periparotid
         Preauricular

     Suboccipital
